narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Arisa Health, Inc. is a Marriage & Family Therapist provider based in Springdale, AR. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.9M in Medicaid payments across 220K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
